name: Bartender Fantasy League
description:
Download and play or  just visit https://bfl.netlify.app
-----
Live out your dream of being a bar manager in all it's glory.

Be a decision maker, make cocktails, get drunk on the job, hire a goat, and 'help' the owner's spouse. All your usual bar management challenges from the comfort of your own home.

Anyone can be a good bar manager. There's nothing to it.. or is there?
